simplified: 吃人家的嘴软，拿人家的手短

pronunciation.pinyin: chī rén jiā de zuǐ ruǎn , ná rén jiā de shǒu duǎn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: chi1 ren2 jia1 de5 zui3 ruan3 , na2 ren2 jia1 de5 shou3 duan3

details.simplified: 吃人家的嘴软，拿人家的手短
details.traditional: 吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短

meanings.value: the mouth that has been fed by others is soft, the hand that has received doesn't reach
fig. one is partial to those from whom presents have been accepted
